alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula; Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Lower Kobuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 1:25PM AKST until January 16 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST MONDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Kivalina and Red Dog Dock, Lower Kobuk Valley and Baldwin Peninsula. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 6 AM Monday to 6 AM AKST Tuesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could cause power outages.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Peninsula; Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Lower Kobuk Valley
